description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases except ozone depleting substances (halocarbons: CFCs and HCFCs), including CO2, N2O, CH4, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, and NF3.
name: Historical WMGHG No Halocarbons
longName: Historical Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas (WMGHG) Concentrations except halocarbons
keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, No Halocarbon, no Ozone Depleting Substances, no ODS
